title: Hi, I have a Google pixel 3 with Android 11 and Playstore is crashing within seconds of opening.
content: I'm trying to open Playstore and it's crashing in my pixel 3, I have to force stop within settigs. I have cleared the data cache and storage in the app settings. I fixed it before and I can't remember exactly how but I recall having to reset/remove some updates. I can't remember how to do it! Help!
